purpose: Breaks down food into smaller molecules for the absorption of nutrients and removes solid waste.

interfaces.name: Nutrient Absorption
interfaces.description: Absorbed nutrients are delivered to cardiovascular system for distribution. Verified by physiology literature.
interfaces.source_verification: Existing - verified by authoritative sources (NCBI, PubMed)

interfaces.name: Waste Removal
interfaces.description: Removes solid and liquid waste in coordination with urinary system. Verified by physiology literature.
interfaces.source_verification: Existing - verified by authoritative sources (NCBI, PubMed)

verification_notes: Based on established anatomical and physiological sources.

justification.rationale: Standard anatomical model; all interfaces are well-documented in literature.
